item.title: Neural Operators for PDEs
item.description: A visualization of a neural operator solving a heat equation. ðŸ“– Paper Neural Operators for PDEs In scientific machine learning, data-driven deep learning methods aim to predict the solutions of partial differential equations (PDEs), avoiding the computationally expensive numerical integration required for large-scale simulations. This is especially beneficial for applications like domain optimization and precision medicine, where multiple PDEs need to be solved across varying parameters or domains, demanding significant computational resources.
